privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This page explains, at a high level, how ThotNet Core processes data when you use the site.
privacy.adsense: Advertising: We may use Google AdSense to display ads. Google and its partners may use cookies or similar technologies to show ads, measure performance, and prevent fraud, subject to your consent where required.
privacy.analytics: Analytics: We may use analytics to understand site usage and improve the product (for example, performance, feature adoption, and reliability).
privacy.control: You can review or change your ad-related consent choices at any time via the "Cookie Settings" link in the footer.
privacy.disclaimer: This page is provided for informational purposes only and may be updated. It is not legal advice.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using ThotNet Core, you agree to use the service responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
terms.accounts: Accounts: Some features may require signing in. You are responsible for safeguarding access to your account.
terms.availability: Availability: The service is provided on an "as is" basis and may change over time as we improve the platform.
terms.disclaimer: These terms are a short summary and may be updated. They do not replace a full legal agreement.

empty.title: No articles yet

gdpr.title: We value your privacy
gdpr.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to personalize content and ads, provide social features, and analyze traffic. You can choose to accept all cookies, reject non-essential cookies, or customize your preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic site functionality. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: Used to deliver relevant ads and measure ad effectiveness.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Allow personalized content and ad recommendations.
